text: Esta é uma lista de fotografias mais caras da história. == Lista == Posição Artista Obra Preço Data Leilão 1 Man Ray Le Violon d'Ingres (1924) $12.400.000 Christie's New York 2 Edward Steichen The Flatiron (1904) $11.800.000 Christie's New York 3 Andreas Gursky Rhein II (1999) $4.338.500 Christie's New YorkThe Most Expensive Photo in the World. theatlanticwire.com (2011-11-09). Acessado em 2011-11-10. 4 Richard Prince Spiritual America (1981) $3.973.000 Christie's New York 5 Cindy Sherman Untitled #96 (1981) $3.890.500 Christie's New YorkCindy Sherman Print Sells For $3.9 Million At Auction, The Highest Ever For A Photograph. Popphoto.com (2011-05-12). Retrieved on 2011-08-01. 6 Gilbert & George To Her Majesty (1973) $3.765.276 Christie's London 7 Jeff Wall Dead Troops Talk (A vision after an ambush of a Red Army patrol, near Moqor, Afghanistan, winter 1986) (1992) $3.666.500 Christie's New York. theglobeandmail.com (2012-05-08). Retrieved on 2012-05-09. 8 Andreas Gursky 99 Cent II Diptychon (2001) $3.346.456 Sotheby's London auctionThe First $3M Photograph. Web.archive.org (2007-03-18).
